attr.title: Franken
attr.desc: Fight monsters, get stronger, and find three magic orbs to save the world. Features: a very simple battle system, a bestiary to learn about enemies, world exploration, and NPC dialogue. Estimated playtime: 30 minutes to 1 hour.
attr.inst: Game files are included and ready to run. Thanks, splendidland https://www.splendid.land
attr.inst_md: Game files are included and ready to run. Thanks, [splendidland](https://www.splendid.land)!
